overview: When you assign an issue to Copilot, you’ll now automatically be added as an assignee yourself. This makes it easier to track your work using filters like assignee:@me and understand who is working on an issue.

detailed_explanation.title: Overview
bullets: When you assign an issue to Copilot, you’ll now automatically be added as an assignee yourself. This makes it easier to track your work using filters like assignee:@me and understand who is working on an issue.

detailed_explanation.title: Share your feedback
bullets: Join the community discussion to share your feedback or learn more in our documentation on assigning issues to Copilot .

insights: Share your feedback Join the community discussion to share your feedback or learn more in our documentation on assigning issues to Copilot .
